flags.description: Filter by job production plan ID
flags.name: --job-production-plan
--contact-method
flags.validation: One of: email_address, mobile_number. Example: email_address.

permissions: Available to users visible in policy scope: admins; customer members (or broker members for the customer) see subscriptions for their customer job production plans; material supplier members see only their own subscriptions tied to job production plans that use their material sites.
validation_notes: Filters are optional. contact-method filter must be one of email_address or mobile_number when provided.
